overview: Thieves converge in a warehouse to share a score a couple of them made. They found a purse sitting in a car just waiting to be taken. One remarks that it's just like someone left it there for them to take. As they rummage through it, a voice recites the contents of what's inside the purse. Confirming it's hers, she fights each of the thieves with different weapons and styles, and takes her purse back.
title: Retribution's Child
